attributes.action: ensure through whatever means possible that the Church of Scientology does not receive official status as either a religion or a charity in the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition if you, like me, believe that the Church of Scientology is a cult and not a religion. 

It bullies its critics and exploits the emotionally vulnerable. 

It blames psychiatry for the Holocaust and calls it an industry of death.

Halt the expansion of this totalitarian pseudo-faith by making sure it is never given charitable or religious status in the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland.

In the words of Scientology's founder, L. Ron Hubbard:

"You don't get rich writing science fiction. If you want to get rich, you start a religion".
- at a meeting of the Eastern Science Fiction Association on the 7th of November, 1948.
